about_the_game:
About This Game

Enter the Fight with Zack in Fight!
Zack in Fight is a fast-paced 1v1 2D fighting game where the time-bending heroes and villains from the Zack in Time universe clash in epic battles! Featuring unique characters, combat mechanics, and Handmade 2D animations, it's the game for zack in time fans.

Features

💥 Unique Characters from Zack in Time

  • Choose from a diverse roster of time-hopping characters, each with unique abilities, combos, and fighting styles.

🎮 Local and Remote Multiplayer

  • Face off against your friends in local couch co-op or use Play Together to play with your friends online.

🎨 Stunning 2D Art and Animations

  • Gorgeous, hand-drawn characters and environments bring the Zack in Time universe to life with a vibrant, retro aesthetic.

🔗 Multiple Game

  • Versus Mode: Test your skills in quick battles against other players.

Join the Fight and Rewrite Time!

Whether you’re a seasoned fighting game pro or a time-traveling newcomer, Zack in Fight offers a fresh twist on classic brawlers. Ready your skills, perfect your combos, and prepare to Fight for the Future, the Past, and Everything In-Between!

Wishlist Now!
Don’t miss out on Zack in Fight! Add it to your Wishlist to be notified about updates, new characters, and release details.

name: Zack in Fight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual core with Hyper-Threading
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: 2D Traditionally Hand Animated Fighting Game based on the Animated Adventures of Zack in Time project
